record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1901. Fifth row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Ferdinand Mosley Horton, and Edward Reed Ferris; fourth row: August Jahn, Robert Lewellyn Henry, and Frederick Graham Moloney; third row: Richard Howells Wellington and Murray B. Louer; second row: Harvey Hurd Lord, William M. Carey, William Arthur Moloney (captain), Ernest Earl Perkins, and Eugene B. Bliss; first row: Zelmer Roswell Pettet and Alfred William Place.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Upper right edge of photo damaged.
